CustomField.description: This simplifies all the possible accounting systems, and returns only Elite, Aderant, and Other.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Elite (3E)"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Elite Enterprise 3.x"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Enterprise 3.11"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Elite Enterprise 3.10"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Elite Enterprise 3.9"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Elite Enterprise 3.8"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Elite Enterprise 3.7"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Elite Enterprise 3.6"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Elite Enterprise 3.5"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Elite Enterprise 3.4"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Elite Enterprise 3.3"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Elite (Informix)"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Elite (Oracle)"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Elite (SQL)"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Elite (Web Services)"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Elite Enterprise"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Elite Envision"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "LegalVision"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Pilgrim LawSoft"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Prolaw") ), "Elite", IF( OR( INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Aderant Back Office"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Aderant Expert"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Aderant Expert 8"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Aderant Expert 7"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "CMS"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "CMS 5.0"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Javelan"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Keystone on Oracle"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Omega"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Rainmaker") ), "Aderant", IF( OR( INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Affinity"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Axxia"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Axxia DNA"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "LexisOne"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Juris")), "LexisNexis", IF( OR( INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "TFB"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Tikit Firmware")), "Tikit", IF( OR( INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "LMS Accounting"), INCLUDES(AccountingPortfolio__c, "Rippe & Kingston/LMS")), "Rippe & Kingston", "Unknown/Other")))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This simplifies all the possible accounting systems, and returns only Elite, Aderant, and Other.
CustomField.label: Accounting - Simple
